name: [center]Ymir[/center]
text: Why have you come to my realm?

name: [center]Ymir[/center]
text: [color=#00BFFF][i]Ragnarök[/i][/color], you say? A quest from Odin?

name: [center]Ymir[/center]
text: No matter, a fool’s errand that you’ve been sent on

name: [center]Ymir[/center]
text: This shall be your final battle
